languages.text: "Я уж подумала, что морок застилает мой взор, когда узрела появление Аребенниана на судилище архонтов. Ибо он — предвестник воистину чудовищных событий..."

traits.locale_text: "Я уж подумала, что морок застилает мой взор, когда узрела появление Аребенниана на судилище архонтов. Ибо он — предвестник воистину чудовищных событий..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."
languages.original_text: "Я уж подумала, что морок застилает мой взор, когда узрела появление Аребенниана на судилище архонтов. Ибо он — предвестник воистину чудовищных событий..."

traits.locale_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “当时，我在执政官的宫廷里看到那个独角时，我还以为是某种幻觉扭曲了我的视线。独角一旦出现，便预示着会发生可怕的事情……”
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: “当时，我在执政官的宫廷里看到那个独角时，我还以为是某种幻觉扭曲了我的视线。独角一旦出现，便预示着会发生可怕的事情……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Pensé que algún tipo de ilusión había nublado mis ojos cuando vi al Arebennian en la corte del Arconte, pues es un presagio de tiempos espantosos...».
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: «Pensé que algún tipo de ilusión había nublado mis ojos cuando vi al Arebennian en la corte del Arconte, pues es un presagio de tiempos espantosos...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アーコンの宮廷でアーベニアンを見たときは、何かの幻覚が見えているのかと思った。彼は不幸を報せる凶兆だから…」
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: 「アーコンの宮廷でアーベニアンを見たときは、何かの幻覚が見えているのかと思った。彼は不幸を報せる凶兆だから…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich glaubte, eine Illusion habe meinen Blick getrübt, als ich den Arebennian am Hof des Archonten sah. Denn er ist ein Omen, dass monströse Dinge kommen ..."
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaubte, eine Illusion habe meinen Blick getrübt, als ich den Arebennian am Hof des Archonten sah. Denn er ist ein Omen, dass monströse Dinge kommen ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai cru qu'une illusion était venue me voiler le regard lorsque j'ai aperçu l'Arebennian au tribunal des archontes, car sa présence est bien souvent le présage de désastres imminents... »
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai cru qu'une illusion était venue me voiler le regard lorsque j'ai aperçu l'arebennian au tribunal des archontes, car sa présence est bien souvent le présage de désastres imminents... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Arkonların Mahkemesi'nde Arebennian'ı gördüğümde bakışlarıma bir yanılsamanın gölgesi düştü sandım. Zira o, bizi bekleyen tüm habisliklerin alametidir."
languages.original_text: "I thought some illusion had clouded my gaze when I beheld the Arebennian at the Archons' court. For he is an omen of monstrous things to come..."

traits.locale_text: "Arkon'un sarayında Arebennian'ı gördüğümde bakışlarıma bir yanılsamanın gölgesi düştü sandım. Çünkü o, bizi bekleyen tüm habisliklerin alametidir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
